title: Part Two: Focus on the Family: Love Won Out
itunes:title: Part Two: Focus on the Family: Love Won Out
description:
Garrison Davis is joined by Robert Evans to continue discussing Focus on the Family.

FOOTNOTES:

  1. https://www.wnd.com/wp-content/uploads/Focusletter.pdf
